intro.p: The GStreamer team is proud to announce a new bug-fix release in the 1.x stable series of the core of the GStreamer streaming media framework.

The 1.x series is a stable series targeted at end users. It is not API or ABI compatible with the stable 0.10.x series. It is, however, parallel installable with the 0.10.x series and will not affect an existing 0.10.x installation.

p.i: "Such ingratitude. After all the times I've saved your life."

intro.p: A collection of plugins you'd want to have right next to you on the battlefield. Shooting sharp and making no mistakes, these plugins have it all: good looks, good code, and good licensing. Documented and dressed up in tests. If you're looking for a role model to base your own plugin on, here it is.

If you find a plot hole or a badly lip-synced line of code in them, let us know - it is a matter of honour for us to ensure Blondie doesn't look like he's been walking 100 miles through the desert without water.

This module contains a set of plugins that we consider to have good quality code, correct functionality, our preferred license (LGPL for the plugin code, LGPL or LGPL-compatible for the supporting library). We believe distributors can safely ship these plugins. People writing elements should base their code on these elements.

Other modules containing plugins are:
gst-plugins-base contains a basic set of well-supported plugins gst-plugins-ugly contains a set of well-supported plugins, but might pose problems for distributors gst-plugins-bad contains a set of less supported plugins that haven't passed the rigorous quality testing we expect, or are still missing documentation and/or unit tests gst-libav contains a set of codecs plugins based on libav (formerly gst-ffmpeg)

bug.summary: multifilesrc: always honour stop-index
qtdemux: add support for LPCM QuickTime 7 uncompressed audio
rtspsrc: add 'proxy-id' and 'proxy-pw' properties to match souphttpsrc
[win/macosx] udpsink no longer supports IPv4, only IPv6
flacparse: handle toc-select event
Some audio-based depayloaders are sometimes incorrectly indicating discont flag and RTP-marker bit.
oss4sink: totem does not show correct volume on startup
SRTP support
remove pt value from selected rtp pay/depayloaders
Jitterbuffer: does not put the same gst timestamp on packets with the same RTP timestamp
matroska: track INVISIBLE flag for vp8
rtpbin: free_stream() does not remove the stream reference from the associated client's stream list
rtpssrcdemux: Safely push on pads that might be removed due to a RTCP BYE
rtpsession: mt-safe event-push
rtpsession: Ensure MT safe event handling and plug event leak
jitterbuffer: don't produce lost-events for expired packets
rtpsession: dead code in check_collision handling
wavenc: add TOC support
wavenc: support LIST INFO chunk
Matroska: per-track tags support
Matroska: Support tag targets
Matroska: expand tag mapping
Matroska: recursive SimpleTags
vp8enc: memory leak if auto-alt-ref-frames=1
rtspsrc: allow client not to reconnect
videomixer: can't compile orc_overlay_argb on x86, not enough registers, crash
rtpjpegpay doesn't support width or height greater than 2040
Short circuit gst_vp8_dec_handle_frame if keyframe is missing
videomixer: Y offset should be compared to height, not width
vp8enc: not robust enough for RTP, errors out on packet loss
videocrop: Add support for automatic cropping (GST 1.0)
udpsrc does not handle EHOSTUNREACH for Linux as it does for Win32
videocrop: Add NV12/NV21 support
vp8dec: aspect ratio lost after seeking
videoflip: Add NV12/NV21 support
videoflip: Add gray 8/16 support
Directsound plugins fail to compile
tell configure and the v4l2 plugin where videodev2.h is
interleave: negotiation failure on sinkpads when channel-mask is specified
matroskademux: empty string on taglist field warning
pngdec: decoded frames are not pushed out
avidemux: a/v sync off on sample video when activated in push mode
v4l2src doesn't emit the prepare-format signal anymore
tests: use g_timeout_add_seconds
avimux: add raw 8-bit monochrome support
Fixing leak in avimux in gst_avi_mux_do_buffer
dmabuf-based GstMemory and GstAllocator incl. v4l2src support
pulsesink: Update segdone periodically
alpha: improve descriptions of chroma keying-related properties and enums
avidemux: support raw avi with negative height
avimux: support raw BGR video
Segmentation fault on gst_v4l2_buffer_pool_process after sending " start-capture " signal to camerabin2 just after setting the pipeline state to PLAYING
udpsink does not work with IPv4 addresses on MacOSX
y4mdec: doesn't work with playbin
qtmux should use provided DTS and not make up its own
wavparse: add 'note' chunk support
Problems feeding wavparse with 0-byte file
wavenc: add 'note' chunk support
ac3parse: handle audio/x-private1-ac3 and convert to audio/x-ac3
The level element doesn't respect accurately the " interval " property.
rtpsbcdepay is not selected from decodebin
vp8dec reports decoding errors as " No key frame " giving no extra information
rtpsbcdepay: fix compilation using mingw
rtpsbcdebay: incorrect frame length calculation for mono and full stereo modes
deinterlace: mode=interlaced doesn't force deinterlacing
souphttpsrc: proper SCHEDULING query support
mulawenc: send maximum bitrate tag downstream
osx_audio: miscellaneous improvements
v4l2: bufferpool: remove unused includes
v4l2: bufferpool: reset buffer size in release_buffer
v4l2: handle return value -ENOTTY for unimplemented VIDIOC_G_PARM
v4l2: add support for mpeg4 and H.263
v4l2: handle ENODATA return value for VIDIOC_ENUMSTD
v4l2: cache CIDs until the device is opened
mulawdec: Change base class to GstAudioDecoder
v4l2: fix copying of encoded buffers
v4l2: also poll for output devices
qtdemux: enable VP6F codec to allow playback for the Flash video embedded in MP4
v4l2: fix broken boolean expression to detect non-frame buffers
v4l2: fix and cleanup VIDIOC_EXPBUF handling
v4l2: try to allocate new buffers with VIDIOC_CREATE_BUFS if needed
v4l2: always generate video info from caps
v4l2: fill out v4l2_buffer.bytesused field for v4l2sink
rtpgstpay: uses an already-unreffed event in its sink_event handler
videomixer: resets its current segment when receiving a flush stop
v4l2: request 0 buffers when stopping
videomixer: Sends caps event before stream-start
doc: audiowsinclimit frequency property now called cutoff
tests: Some unit test in good sends SEGMENT before caps
tests: New runtime check force unit tests to send initial events
shapewipe sample pipeline won't work
rtpgstpay: sticky events are not forwarded to to the src pad
test: Fix some more misordering issues in plugins-good
deinterlace: Doesn't set caps for buffer pool
v4l2: only add interlace-mode to the caps for raw formats
v4l2: copy and set the actual size of the content
v4l2: set pixel-aspect-ratio for capture devices only
videocrop: Add support for GRAY16_LE/GRAY16_BE
v4l2: don't stop streaming when set_caps is called with unchanged caps
rtpjpegpay/depay: Add framerate and optional framesize SDP attribute to payloaded caps
v4l2: keep a reference to all queued buffers
rtspsrc: parse SDP framerate and dimension attributes
videomixer: z-ordering breaks if pads are added without setting zorder on it
videomixer : on query caps, we should return FALSE if the source pad has no current caps.
v4l2: rework sink buffer refcounting
v4l2: iterate controls with V4L2_CTRL_FLAG_NEXT_CTRL
v4l2: call VIDIOC_REQBUFS with count = 0 in pool_finalize
Latest GIT version of v4l2src fails to compile on older kernels
matroskademux: set streamheader on vorbis/theora srcpad caps for easier remuxing
qtdemux: send GAP events for subtitles, handle subtitles with SBLT subtype
